name: USCoreRelatedpersonName
description:
**A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text**  
**NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the
[Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html)
 - multipleAnd
 - multipleOr
 - comparator
 - modifier
 - chain

id us-core-relatedperson-name

code : name

base :RelatedPerson

type : string

expression : RelatedPerson.name

xpath : f:RelatedPerson/f:name

xpathUsage : normal

mulitpleOr : True (Conformance Expectation = MAY)
